name: Meteor Smasher
description:
Download Instructions: extract the zip and use the weeklyjam165 executable

Made in two days as part of Weekly Jam 165

Theme: One Button Mash

Directions: Use Left Mouse Click to drag and launch the player, as well as click Left Mouse on screen to shoot incoming Meteors.

I hope to add background music before the jam ends, but probably will not have time this week. See you guys another jam. =)

Game by Zyuxis

Tools: Aseprite, Unity, BFXR
